commit message:
sounds can now be paused when the component is in 'inactive' state.
version strings changed to v1.7

- changed control priority from ...
(1) drops, (2) horizontal movement, (3) rotation ... to ...
(1) rotation), (2) horizontal movement, (3) drops
- movement timer now doesnt reset when hitting a wall. this means:
the piece will instantly move horizontally while the button is held
and movement becomes possible again

play store publishing version
- sound tweaks
- each activity will set music volume on default
